tool_description: Fetches scholarly commentary and interpretive notes for specific scripture passages from various theological traditions.

reference.description: Scripture reference to get commentary for

commentary_type.description: Type of commentary: exegetical, devotional, historical, theological, or all

theological_tradition.description: Specific tradition: protestant, catholic, orthodox, jewish, or ecumenical

error_messages: Invalid reference: Provide a valid scripture reference in standard format.
Invalid commentary type: Use one of [exegetical, devotional, historical, theological, all].
Invalid theological tradition: Use one of [protestant, catholic, orthodox, jewish, ecumenical].
No commentary available: No commentary found for the specified passage and criteria.
usage: Provide a scripture reference, optionally specify commentary type and theological tradition. Returns relevant scholarly commentary and interpretive insights.

commentary_source.description: Source or author of the commentary

key_insights.description: Main interpretive points from the commentary
